Package index

Package

CAVAanalytics is a comprehensive framework for climate data analysis, offering streamlined access to data, advanced processing and visualization capabilities. It is designed to support a wide range of climate research and user needs

Main functions

Load, process and visualize

load_data()
Models download/upload
load_data_hub()
Models upload (only works from the University of Cantabria Jupyter HUB environment)
model_biases()
Visualization of model biases
projections()
Analysis of future projections
climate_change_signal()
Calculation of climate change signal
observations()
Analysis of observations-historical period
plotting()
Plot CAVAanalytics Results
extract_raster()
Write rasters

Memory efficient

Load and process in spatial chunks

load_data_and_projections()
Load data and apply function projections in spatial chunks
load_data_and_climate_change_signal()
Load data and apply function climate_change_signal in spatial chunks
load_data_and_model_biases()
Load data and apply function model_biases in spatial chunks

Utils

Accessory functions

C4R_to_CAVA()
Converting C4R lists into CAVAanalytics list
IPCC_palette()
IPCC color palette
thrs()
Calculation of thresholds
thrs_consec()
Consecutive days
years_selection()
Subset years in CAVAlist
remove_facets()
Clean text from plots
rename_facets()
Customise facet text
